comments.body: I don't know. Currently, the model, seems to me, speaks poorly in languages other than English. I guess Google will ship a bigger and better model in a few weeks that will be able to speak in more languages. It does understand a lot of languages though, just the pronunciation is not great,

title: Calling the phone's rear camera
body:
Hello, thank you for your efforts.
The front camera is automatically selected at the startup of the mobile browser, can I change it so that I can select the front and back camera when I use the mobile browser?
author: babyedi3

comments.body: Hey, @babyedi3, check it out now and see if it works.
